results.headline: Review: Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone Aswirl in Tra La La Land
results.summary_short: Ms. Stone and Mr. Gosling sing and dance their way to art and love in Damien Chazelle’s new movie.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of La La Land

results.headline: Drill Sergeant in the Music Room
results.summary_short: Damien Chazelle’s “Whiplash” is a movie about music, but it could just as well have been about an underdog sports team.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Whiplash

results.display_title: Guy and Madeline on a Park Bench
results.headline: The Blissed-Out Rhythms of the Young and in Love
results.summary_short: A Boston-based musical commentary on love and art, “Guy and Madeline on a Park Bench” floats on a wave of spontaneity and charm.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Guy and Madeline on a Park Bench
